text: OLTP VS. OLAP On-line Transaction Processing (OLTP): — Short-lived read/write txns. — Small footprint. — Repetitive operations. On-line Analytical Processing (OLAP): — Long-running, read-only queries. — Complex joins. — Exploratory queries.
